Miele_API_link: If you need new Miele API credentials, please click here!
delayedProcessing_desc: Whether all occurring messages will be processed or whether event storms get filtered.
donation: If you like this adapter, please consider a donation to support my work.
locale_desc: Language the Miele-API should respond in
messageDelay_desc: Time in milliseconds. If multiple messages occur in this timeframe, only the last one will be processed. The others will be discarded.
oauth2_vg_desc: Country the Miele account was opened in.
on save adapter restarts with new config: on save adapter restarts with new config immediately
pollInterval_desc: Time between two API polls (in poll interval unit)
pollUnit_desc: Poll API in seconds or minutes
sse_desc: Check this option to get the data pushed by the server; uncheck to use time based polling.
